title: Which has better job prospects, Oracle, Salesforce, IBM, or SAP? - Quora

response.answer_text: Let me put a general statement before writing any thing further: You will be successful in almost any one career as long as you did it honestly and with hard work. Here are some other thoughts: I am in SAP and I still see after 18 years already inside it that it is a wonderful career to make money and to create some impact in business. I dont see any competition in near future. For me, SAP will be number 1 choice.Being a cloud application, Salesforce has big potential but generally projects dont need that many resources and rate is lower than SAP for consultants.Oracle: I am not sure, which product of Oracle, are you referring here? But in general it does not come in my top choice.IBM: It has many products, some products are better than other. Still it is not my top choice.So I will go with SAP and then Salesforce.

SAP work in that companywork in a partner organisation that sells SAPwork in a customer place that has SAP solutionsSAP is being used by most of the companies(say nearly 60%) globally. you could learn to become a functional(Domain - Finance, Purchases, Sales etc.,)consultant or technical( Basis, ABAP, UX, SAP Cloud Platform) or Sales/Presales person selling SAP Solution
